description: John is a well-regarded team leader at InnoSoft Solutions, a mid-sized software development company. He routinely writes group emails to keep everyone informed about office matters and project updates.
relationship: John’s primary audience is the entire InnoSoft staff—developers, designers, project managers and administrative personnel. Specific colleagues mentioned include Sarah, a front-end developer who needs ergonomic adjustments, and Jane, an engineer requesting hearing-impairment accommodations. All of them are John’s coworkers whom he supervises or collaborates with.
